title: Against all odds: the story of Australia's North West Shelf Gas Project
creator_credit: Woodside Petroleum Ltd and The Film House
brief_description: Traces the development of the North West Shelf Gas Project from the discovery of natural gas reserves in the 1970’s to the commissioning of a second off-shore platform in 1995. Highlights the successful export of liquefied natural gas to Japan.
title_for_label: Against all odds: the story of Australia’s North West Shelf Gas Project
creator_credit_for_label: Woodside Petroleum Ltd and The Film House
